From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: 12 March 2025 13:08
To: Andrew Knight <Andrew.Knight@kioxia.com>
Subject: RE: 00437078 - iphone USB connect allowed

Hello Andrew,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00437078. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00437078
Ticket Subject: iphone USB connect allowed
Ticket Details: WE have the setting set to allow for power only when an iPhone is connected, but when trying it out recently we have found that when an iPhone is connected it allows you to browse the storage of the USB, this is restricted to the camera roll, but does allow a user to download files from an iPhone to the PC. We need to stop this but still allow charging for iPhones,

Thank you!

Marian Ilies
Technical Support Engineer
____________________ _________
Cybersecurity That Works for You

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com<https://www.netwrix.com>
